detail_desc: Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length lace kaftan with a crocheted trim around the opening, a drawstring and twisted ties at the waist, and long sleeves. Scalloped trim around the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing at the cuffs. Bottoms in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening at the front and a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with buttons at the top. Long sleeves with a frill trim on the shoulders and elastication with decorative ties at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side and a flounce at the hem. Jersey underskirt.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a print motif on the front, wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elastic hem. Bottoms with wide elastication at the waist.
Trousers in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a high, elasticated waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket shorts in flexible, patterned stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies. Diameter 4 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a metal fastening at the front.

Set with a short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey and denim leggings. Top with a print motif on the front. Leggings in washed superstretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, elasticated neckline, short raglan sleeves, decorative buttons at the top and an elasticated seam under the bust. Unlined.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a high polo neck, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with worn details, visible buttons at the front and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Cotton twill shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with a shimmering plastic stone.
Three necklaces in different widths of metal chain. Adjustable length, 41-48 cm.
Jumper in soft, cable-knit cotton with a small embroidered appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Trenchcoat in a crêpe weave with wide notch lapels with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, loose yoke with a pleat at the back, and a single back vent. Detachable tie belt at the waist, a decorative tab at the cuffs and diagonal welt pockets. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in plumeti chiffon with smocking and a small frill at the top, long sleeves and ties at the cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Shirt in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and two flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Chino shorts in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a glittery text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist, all-over print and ribbed hems.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets and elasticated hems.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with beaded embroidery and sequins at the top. Small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.

prod_name: SB Samuel water repelle jkt TP
detail_desc: Padded jacket in a water-repellent weave with a padded, detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Reflective details. Partly lined in fleece. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Pyjamas with a short-sleeved top and pair of shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Top with an overlocked edge on the sleeves and at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.

Calf-length coat in a felted wool blend with a collar and buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets and discreet side pockets. Slightly longer at the back with rounded sides.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back and shoulder straps with a bow on top.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of puff pants in an airy cotton weave. Top with buttons at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Puff pants with elastication and a frill-trim at the waist and around the hems.

Padded jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped front pockets, and inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Biker jacket in soft suede with a pile lining, notch lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and a small flap pocket with a concealed press-stud at the front.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Jumpers in fine-knit cotton with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Tube scarf in a soft, textured knit.
Double-breasted jacket in bouclé made from a cotton blend with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in slub cotton jersey with a yoke in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.
Long-sleeved blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Two elasticated seams at the waist, and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Striped shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front, hood with a decorative drawstring, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jersey tunic with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with a faux fur trim at the top of the shaft and lacing with a drawstring at the front. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Sandals with adjustable foot straps and a loop at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles, fluted underneath.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastener.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with an elastic gore in one side. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Blouse in a striped cotton weave with a collar, asymmetric, diagonal buttoning and a tie at one side. Long sleeves with wide, flared cuffs with a slit, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem.
Espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and hard-worn details.
Jacket in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and organic cotton blend with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather sandals with adjustable foot straps with metal buckles, an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Moulded rubber soles, fluted underneath.
Short, lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with decorative flatlock seams, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Jersey top with flounce-trimmed short sleeves.

Lightweight down jacket in a quilted weave with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and welt side pockets with a concealed zip. Filling 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers from Re:Down®.
Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, a low crotch and straight, wide legs.
Metal earrings. Two thicker pairs and two thinner pairs. Diameter approx. 2 cm.
Straight-cut coat with a soft, brushed finish, notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt front pockets. Unlined.
Earrings in hammered metal with plastic stones. Length 6 cm.
Trousers in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an elasticated waist and wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Satin sandals with a wrapover top and ankle strap that is elasticated at the back. Imitation patent leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
